snippet: After Ray Rice’s football contract was terminated by his team on Monday, Janay Palmer Rice became a public example of the complex psychology of women abused by men.
abstract: Janay Palmer Rice, wife of Baltimore Ravens star running back Ray Rice, has become most famous battered wife in country after making public statement about domestic violence she suffered; Rice is extraordinary public example of complex psychology of women abused by men; her biography may help explain her actions, as she has in public appearances seemed to be completely invested in her husband.
lead_paragraph: After Ray Rice’s football contract was terminated by his team on Monday, Janay Palmer Rice became a public example of the complex psychology of women abused by men.

headline.seo: Janay Palmer, Ray Rice’s Wife, Implied the Assault Was Taken Out of Context
headline.main: Seeing Abuse, and a Pattern Too Familiar
headline.print_headline: Seeing Abuse, and a Pattern Too Familiar
